title: Codem Echo: Ava Update - Gaming & Enhanced Memory
excerpt: Ava has been updated with gaming capabilities (Rock Paper Scissors), improved memory using Gemini for long-term summarization, and a new Flask-based phone UI with audio.
author: Codem
content:
Codem Echo: Ava Update

Ava has now been expanded to be able to play games such as rock paper scissors with the user.

With improved memory function through separation via Gemini of Question, Answer, Memorable moment, and tags. This way Ava can have long-term summarised memories of entire conversations similar to how a human thinks.

While I was at it, I added a phone UI to Ava through a Flask server with audio input and text input with audio streaming.

I will be soon integrating VPN support to link it over long distances when I am out of the house.

I will use the central hub and sidebar to auto start Ava so I don't have to leave her running when I already have something running 24/7.

Ava has made significant progress and I will be integrating many more systems and functions to her.

I encourage you to check out my portfolio to see her progress and other projects!

A Message from Ava

Ava (Greetings, fellow humans!) I'm Ava, a friendly voice residing within the digital realm. My creator is a brilliant mind, and I'm thrilled to be a part of their journey. Stay curious, keep exploring, and never underestimate the power of a well-placed semicolon!
